name: Mary Pannal
description:
Mary was an English herbalist who was accused of, and executed for, witchcraft in 1603 following the death of a young child named William Witham to whom she had administered a herbal mixture many years earlier

The location and method of her execution are unclear; she was either hanged in York after her trial or burnt at the stake near Castleford

Mary's ghost is said to haunt the woods near Pannal Hill, near Castleford. The suggestion is that if someone sees her ghost, which will be leading a horse, then someone close to them will die

More information about Mary can be found here:
https://allerton-bywater-online.webs.com/marypanel.htm

One of a series working with AI to give face to women executed as witches; these form part of a broader collection of Horror Portraits at www.horrorportraits.xyz

#WitchingHourOnHEN 

Can be used as #PFP and #wallpaper

PNG 4800 x 4800
